name: http2-cache
description: Exposes http caching to the browser by adding functionality to XMLHttpRequest, and then running XMLHttpRequest over http2 over WebSockets

scripts.pretest: browserify lib/http2-ws.js -o builds/bundle.js && nohup java -jar java-artifacts-TODO-move/ry-develop-SNAPSHOT.jar -script test/reaktivity/ws-echo.js > /dev/null 2>&1 & echo $! > run.pid

author: dpwspoon
